name: Exponential Capital
description: The Exponential Capital team are leaders in their field in farming, trading, seed investment and blockchain innovation. Between them, they already lead large decentralised communities and have a vast network through which opportunities are funnelled. Its traders and farmers have demonstrated exponential growth and resilience in managing their own portfolios. They will manage a dynamic fund that is capable of thriving in any market conditions. The EXPO token represents a proportion of the profits in Exponential Capital. It will give members of the decentralised community fund exposure to a wide range of crypto assets that will generate passive income and capital growth through profits returned in the form of reflections, token buy backs and dividends. Fundamentally, the fund will focus around shifting narrative plays, farming, and short to medium term trading opportunities. The fund will also opportunistically participate in strategic partnerships and seed funding opening up the opportunity for airdrops in the future.
